item.title: Setting Goals for 2010 - Growing in Prosperity and in Spirit - Tony Burroughs of "The Code" - Feb 02,2010
item.description:
Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle and cohost Jane Strassel discuss growing in 2010, setting intentions for the future, and how to grow your spiritual self while still integrating your career and family selves. WEEKLY TOPIC: This is still the start of a new year, and many people are searching for creative ways to prosper, grow spiritually, improve their health, attract a good or stronger relationship, and enhance their lives overall. Tune in as hosts Sabrina Kinckle and Jane Strassel have a heart to heart about their own experiences with so-called "New Years Resolutions" and ways to make them work for you! BOOK RECOMMENDATION: Have you read "The Code," by Tony Burroughs? If you havent read it, or its been a while since you did, tune in as we focus on the ten intentions that will literally change your life! FILM RECOMMENDATION: "The Shift" movie with Wayne Dyer teaches us how we can become the best version of ourselves family and career wise without losing sight of our spiritual selves. Tune in as we discuss this remarkable movie! SPECIAL GUEST: This weeks special guest is Tony Burroughs! He is the author of the bestselling book, "The Code." This book provides ten intentions for creating a life you love!! You dont want to miss this!

item.title: Health and the Law of Attraction, Plus - "The Four Agreements" and "You Can Heal Your Life" - Jan 19,2010
item.description:
Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle and co-host Jane Strassel bring in the New Year with a brand new format!! WEEKLY TOPIC Tune in as Sabrina and Jane have a heart to heart about their own experiences with health and the law of attraction. Learn how you can improve your own health! BOOK RECOMMENDATION Have you read "The Four Agreements" by Don Miguel Ruiz? Its an "oldie but goodie." If you havent read it, or its been a while since you did, tune in as we focus on four amazing agreements that can change your life! FILM RECOMMENDATION The "You Can Heal Your Life" movie with Louise Hay, Wayne Dyer, Gregg Braden and Gay Hendricks teaches us how we can use our thoughts and positive affirmations to enhance our lives. Tune in as we discuss this remarkable movie! SPECIAL GUEST This weeks special guest is Kimberly Martin! Kimberly is a Business Coach and Best-Selling Author. She is an affiliate coach with Queen’s University School of Business and has a Certificate in Adult Training and Development. Kimberly is passionate about helping health and wellness practitioners fill their practice by having enjoyable, authentic, effortless selling interactions! She recently added the title of published author to her credentials, through contributing a chapter to the best-selling anthology book, Overcomer’s Inc.

item.title: Master Your Universe Show - Ways to Save Money During a Challenged Economy - Dec 09,2009
item.description:
You don't want to miss this special broadcast! Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle discusses ways to maintain a positive attitude about finances in spite of economic challenges. Then, tune in as Sabrina interviews financial expert Sonya Celeste about ways to save money during the current economic climate. Sonya Celeste is an finance professional who has experience working in both public and private accounting. In tandem with her professional work, Sonya is dedicated improving the lives of the community and animals. She is an active tutor for children and works as a volunteer fostering rescued animals. Additionally she demonstrates her passion for positively contributing to society through her consciousness of environmental threats and her efforts to save and preserve our planet.

item.title: Master Your Universe Show - Following Your Intuition and the Law of Attraction - Dec 08,2009
item.description:
Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle and co-host Jane Strassel discuss the important of following your intuition. So often, we hear about creating your reality through the Law of Attraction. However, after focusing on what one wants to create in his/her life, many people fail to follow their inner guidance. Tune in to learn some tips for following your intuition and flowing with those "divine coincidences." Also, tune in as we interview best selling author Yvonne Oswald. This truly amazing and purposeful author of "Every Word Has Power" has a unique and powerful technique for developing intuition and awakening soul consciousness. You don't want to miss this one!

item.title: Master Your Universe Show - Lisa Nichols - No Matter What - Nine Steps to Living The Life You Love - Nov 10,2009
item.description:
Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle and cohost Jane Strassel interview Lisa Nichols as she discusses her latest book, "No Matter What - Nine Steps to Living the Life You Love." Nichols is a contributor to two of the largest self-development phenomena in history: She was a featured teacher in the hit DVD "The Secret", and she wrote two books in the bestselling Chicken Soupfor the Soul series. Lisa Nichols has appeared on Oprah, Larry King Live, and Extra, and has been featured in O, The Oprah Magazine. She was a guest life coach on NBC’s "Starting Over", and reaches more than 250,000 people a year through her speaking engagements and seminars.

item.title: Master Your Universe Show - Utilizing the Law of Attraction to Move Beyond Challenges - Oct 20,2009
item.description:
Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle and co-host Jane Strassel discuss ways to move beyond challenges and find a better feeling place. Often, we may be faced with unexpected situations that test our faith in the ability to create what we want in our lives. Learn how such challenges can be a an opportunity to discover which areas of your life need more of your focus and positive realignment. Also, tune in to hear publisher and author Lynne Klippel. Her latest book, "Overcomer's Incorporated: True stories of hope, courage and inspiration" focuses on the enduring power of the human spirit.It features stories from 38 ordinary people who faced extraordinary challenges with grace, power and wisdom.

item.title: Master Your Universe Show - Spiritual Healing and the Law of Attraction - Oct 13,2009
item.description:
Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle and cohost Jane Strassel discuss spiritual healing and the law of attraction. Are you looking for ways to extend your energy to help yourself and others attain more peace, health and prosperity? Learn how to utilize divine light and visualization techniques to send spiritual healing to yourself and others. Also, tune in to hear special guest Catherine VanWetter. Catherine is an Inner Resolution Facilitator of peace, compassion, forgiveness and love, offers individual, family and group Inner Resolution Facilitation that invites individuals to be gentle, compassionate, and courageous as they put down their weapon of choice and step into a field of Grace. "When you can separate your 'story' from the facts then you can live in deep inner peace and heal all areas of your life."

item.title: Master Your Universe Show - Law of Attraction and Creating a Successful Business - Jul 28,2009
item.description:
Tune in as Sabrina Kinckle and co-host Jane Strassel discuss using the Law of Attraction to develop and maintain a strong business. How can you attract clients who want and can afford your services? Tune in to learn how! Also, tune in to hear special guest Liz Pagayonan. Positive Thought Leader, Intentional Scrapbooking Expert, certified hypnotherapist, international speaker and writer, Elizabeth Pagayonan is dedicated to spreading awareness that scrapbooking can be used as a tool to transform any area of life. Creator of the Intentional Scrapbooking Method™, she shows people how to achieve results by deliberately redirecting thoughts and feelings to create and attract what is truly desired in life. Her book, "Fulfill Your Desires Now" will be released in 2009. She also provides DVDs, Intentional Scrapbooking Kits™, teleseminar programs, and workshops. Website: http://www.creatingintentions.com.

item.title: Changing Limiting Beliefs - Jun 03,2009
item.description:
So, you watched "The Secret," read Esther Hicks' books on the Law of Attraction, and have been focusing on positive thinking. Now what? Where is your wealth and success?

Many people love the idea of being able to create what they want in life, but few understand that our beliefs about money and success are just as important as developing a more positive attitude. It is impossible to attract more money, success, a better job, a six-figure income, or anything else if your beliefs contradict your desires.

So, what are some examples of limiting beliefs?

-----"Having large amounts of money takes many years and hard work." If you have this belief, then it will take you a lot of pain, suffering and time to make a substantial amount of money.

-----"I am undeserving of wealth and abundance." It is amazing how many people unknowingly hold this belief. When asked the question, "Do you believe you are deserving of success?" most would answer that they do. However, after digging deeper, many are shocked to discover that they do have subconscious beliefs about being unworthy of success.

-----"Having excess wealth is wrong because there are those who have nothing." Any guilt associated with having money will make it difficult for you to attract more of it. It is important to know that there is an unlimited supply of abundance for everyone. Having less will not make it easier for those who are struggling. As a matter of fact, your ability to help those who are less fortunate may even increase if your financial situation is closer to where you need or want it to be!

So, what are some ways to change these limiting beliefs? One bestselling book that confronts this topic is "The Spontaneous Healing of Belief: Shattering the Paradigm of False Limits," by Gregg Braden. This book provides countless tips and information on how we develop limiting beliefs and what we can do to change them.

For one exercise, Braden suggests writing down a particular goal or desire, making a list of why this goal would enrich your life, and why it is something you should be able to accomplish. For example, let's say your goal is make a six-figure-income from becoming a life coach. Perhaps you want to become a life coach because you truly enjoy helping others. Perhaps you would feel fulfilled because not only would you be making money, but you would be doing something that makes you feel wonderful. You should be able to accomplish your goal because countless people have.

Write down as many examples of success in this area that you can think of. Keep this list in a journal, and carry the journal with you. Whenever you see something on the news, on television, in a book or anywhere else that debunks your limiting belief(s), write it down. Then, later that evening, look over your list and imagine already having what you want. Feel as though you have reached your goal and bask in the happiness of it.

In the end, changing your beliefs starts with you. You have to get to a point where you know you are worthy of having what you want. This wonderful world that we live in provides so many opportunities for success, both personal and monetary successes. Your ability to remember this fact will help you attract the abundance and prosperity you seek.

Author: Sabrina Kinckle
